name: Specification / Standard: AS4654.1-2012; AS3740 - 2010, Manufacturer’s Technical Data Sheet
Check Substrate Check for cracks/defect in concrete. Check critical areas (puddle flanges, penetrations, expansion joints, rebates/setdowns).
Prepare Substrate. (moisture test if required) prepare surface to accept primer using a scraper or grinder and vacuum or sweep residual debris.
Measure and Temporarily fix ElastoFlex or Combiflex
Install ElastoFlex or Combiflex to Movement Joint locations
Remove Push Pins and Patch holes
Final signoff. Visually inspect and ensure adequately cured. Sign-off from builder and hand-over
